name: township-small-business-chatbot
description: The Township Small Business Chatbot is an AI-powered system designed to help users discover and interact with local businesses. It allows users to query information about nearby businesses, receive responses generated by OpenAI's language model, and facilitates communication between customers and businesses. The chatbot enables users to request products or services from local businesses, while providing GPS location tracking for order management and delivery. The system is built using Node.js and MongoDB to handle user profiles, chat messages, and business information.
author: Puseletso Mafisa
